welcomeCurrentPoolSubText: Help us reach our goal! Every contribution makes a difference.
firstTextTile:
Together, we can make a difference

Your donation helps reach the ~${{var1}} in ETH goal for the current donation pool.
secondTextTile:
The Gauge shows current pool progress

Each donation is a fixed amount of ${{var1}} in ETH, and our goal is to reach ${{var2}} in ETH
thirdTextTile:
Bring joy back into your life

Once we hit this target, the entire(*) amount will be donated back to YOU, one lucky donor.

toc.pageTitleText: Please read this carefully and act accordingly.

faq.pageTitleText: Here you will find answers to the most common questions.

special.pageTitle: The one million pool | DonorHub App
special.secondaryText: It's not really ONE MILLION $, but close enough! </br>Because it's up to ETH price. ( ⬈ | ⬉ ) But dare to try it! Who knows, ONE of you will GET it for SURE!
special.welcomeCurrentPoolSubText: Feeling lucky? Once this hits 100% The Smart Contract will choose randomly one address that entered this special pool. And will donate the amount (`) back to this address! As simple as that! Every entry is another chance to be the lucky one and make a difference.

errorPage.primaryText: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
errorPage.secondaryText: It might have been moved, or the URL might be incorrect.

general.copyright: 2024 My DonorHub App. All rights reserved.

pools.name: Pools
pools.title: Donation Pools
pools.text: Explore our social donation pools and make a difference today! </br> Your contribution can create positive change in communities around the world.

articles.name: Articles
articles.title: News and Articles
articles.text: Explore news and interesting articles about crypto univers and about how to make a difference in communities around the world.

form.messageSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!

donateComponent.note:

donateComponent.howToParticipateText: To participate in the pool prize, simply transfer the entry amount using a wallet application of your choice (e.g., MetaMask). These transactions are securely processed through a Smart Contract. Once the transfer is completed, you are automatically enrolled in the prize draw, which will be conducted transparently via Smart Contract.
donateComponent.successMessage: Your donation has been successfully initiated. Thank you!
